message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. That's a bit too high for me right now. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that $120 might be a bit steep for you. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $110 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $100. If we can reach an agreement at that price, I'd be happy to buy the product.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $105. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great value for the product.
